DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine one new type dressing ( MEPORE PRO and/or MEPILEX BORDER ) reduce blister rate compare currently use HYPAFIX .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Three Types Dressings After Hip Surgery
DOC.criteria: Male Female 45 year old old Hip surgery Hopital de l'EnfantJesus 02/2009 01/2010 ( THR , rTHR , DHS , screw fixation , hemiarthroplasty , resurface ) Signed consent form Allergy dress Polytrauma / high energy trauma Wound surgical site prior surgery Neurological deficit operate side ( hemiplegia , etc . ) Bilateral fracture
